A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved it. Found it to be entertaining and liked the juxtapositions as well as the conflicts within the individuals.  Felt the most \"human\" of the Saga.  I understand why many are unhappy with the deviation\, but I thought it was fantastic.  The only thing I was disappointed in really was the lack of tribute to Carrie Fisher (perhaps it was later in the credits than I could stay);  I think a simple acknowledgment and farewell could have provided closure for fans.
